skill.name: iso-13485-certification
skill.description: Comprehensive toolkit for preparing ISO 13485 certification documentation for medical device Quality Management Systems. Use when users need help with ISO 13485 QMS documentation, including (1) conducting gap analysis of existing documentation, (2) creating Quality Manuals, (3) developing required procedures and work instructions, (4) preparing Medical Device Files, (5) understanding ISO 13485 requirements, or (6) identifying missing documentation for medical device certification. Also use when users mention medical device regulations, QMS certification, FDA QMSR, EU MDR, or need help with quality system documentation.
skill.summary: Comprehensive toolkit for preparing ISO 13485 certification documentation for medical device Quality...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: Legitimate ISO 13485 documentation toolkit. Contains one local Python script that scans user-provided documents for compliance keywords and generates reports. No network calls, no credential access, no environment harvesting. All file I/O is scoped to user-specified directories. Fully consistent with stated documentation assistance purpose.

content.value_statement: Medical device teams struggle to build compliant QMS documentation from scratch. This skill provides structured guidance, checklists, and templates to accelerate ISO 13485 preparation and gap analysis.
actual_capabilities: Runs a local gap analysis script against a user document folder to identify missing ISO 13485 procedures
Lists all 31 required ISO 13485 documented procedures with descriptions and keywords
Provides clause-by-clause ISO 13485 requirements reference with implementation guidance
Supplies a complete Quality Manual template with drafting guide and examples
Supplies CAPA and document control procedure templates with forms and attachments
Provides comprehensive gap analysis checklist for audit readiness assessment
limitations: Gap analyzer only reads full text for TXT and MD files, uses filename matching for other formats
Does not extract content from PDF, DOC, or DOCX files
Does not provide legal certification or audit sign-off services
Does not replace expert regulatory consulting for complex compliance situations

use_cases.title: Build QMS from scratch
use_cases.description: Create a Quality Manual and key procedures using structured templates and clause guidance.

use_cases.title: Run documentation gap check
use_cases.description: Scan existing documents to identify missing ISO 13485 procedures and key records.

use_cases.title: Prepare audit readiness
use_cases.description: Use checklists and references to verify QMS coverage before certification audits.

prompt_templates.title: Get started
prompt_templates.prompt: We are starting ISO 13485 implementation. Outline the first five documents to create and explain why they come first.

prompt_templates.title: Gap analysis plan
prompt_templates.prompt: We have a QMS document folder. Explain how to run the gap analyzer and how to interpret the results.

prompt_templates.title: Quality Manual help
prompt_templates.prompt: Using the template, list the key company details I must gather before drafting the Quality Manual.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced CAPA
prompt_templates.prompt: Customize the CAPA procedure template for a Class II device manufacturer with outsourced sterilization.

output_examples.input: Summarize our top ISO 13485 gaps based on missing procedures
output: Missing CAPA, complaint handling, and internal audit procedures identified
Quality Manual not detected in the document set
Priority focus should start with document control and record control procedures
Recommend creating Quality Policy and Medical Device File next

best_practices: Replace all placeholders in templates with company-specific information before approval
Justify any ISO 13485 exclusions clearly and specifically in the Quality Manual
Use the comprehensive checklist to verify every clause before scheduling certification audit
anti_patterns: Copy ISO 13485 standard text verbatim without describing actual organizational processes
Mark procedures as complete without maintaining evidence records for each requirement
Skip document control and record control procedures until late in implementation

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill is text and template based and works across all Claude, Codex, and Claude Code platforms.

faq.question: What are the main limits of the gap analyzer?
faq.answer: It reads TXT and MD file content directly. For PDF, DOC, and DOCX files, it only matches filenames against keywords.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my existing document management system?
faq.answer: Yes. Export your QMS documents to a folder and point the gap analyzer to that directory for scanning.

faq.question: Does the gap analyzer access or transmit my data externally?
faq.answer: No. The script performs local file scanning only and does not make any network calls or external connections.

faq.question: What if the analyzer finds no documents in my folder?
faq.answer: Verify the folder path is correct, files have supported extensions, and you have read permissions on the directory.

faq.question: How does this compare to hiring a regulatory consultant?
faq.answer: This skill provides templates and guidance but does not replace expert review, legal certification advice, or audit representation.
